subject: Timelines for submission of Draft Fee Notifications of DBFOT (Toll) & OTM projects.
text: HTRatv4 7rl Tor)%feaszut TA Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (Ts4 4ac7 3i1r_TTTArT 7314) #4_ Fax : 91-11-25093507 25093514 #f1 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) +-5 & 6, #vr7-10, GnAT, T Arrht-110075 No.S-{84; {ert3r-JoarkeaNar Delhi-110075 01. 03.2013 PQLCY MAITERS_IECHNICAL (126/2013) [Decision_taken_in 136th meeting_of Executive Committeeheld on 21.2.20131 Sub. Timelines for submission of Draft Fee Notifications of DBFOT (Toll) & OMT Projects. Issuing of Fee Notification is a Condition Precedent required to be satisfied by the Authority in case of DBFOT (Toll) and OMT Projects. Executive Committee in its meeting held on 21.02.2013 noted with concern the delays in sending draft Fez Notifications along with a copy of Concession Agreement by Technical Division to CO Division and in processing of fee notifications by CO Division. 2. Executive Committee henceforth fixed the timelines for processing of Fee Notification viz Technical Division to send draft Fee Notification to CO Division within 30 days from date of signing of the Concession Agreement (15 days for OMT Projects); CO Division to send draft Fee Notification to Ministry within 15 days (7 days for OMT Projects); and any observations thereafter shall be replied within 7 days: 3_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. 03 (V.KSharma) Chief General Manager (Coord./LA) AlLolticers and employees of_HQ[ROs[PIUs[CMUslSite Offices K ?
